item.title: Who have you delivered mail to?
item.description: The company I work for (Absorbent Ink) that makes corporate gifts and other <a href=“http://www.absorbentprinting.com/unique_products.php” mce_href=“http://www.absorbentprinting.com/unique_products.php">personalized products. has started sending out a newsletter. Part of this newsletter process for me has been tuning one of our exim based mail servers.

item.title: What to do when your exim queue starts getting unruly.
item.description: Our exim mail server has been getting a bit flakey in the past several weeks. As far as I could tell it was being caused by junk mail getting caught in the queue. After a bit of research I believe I have found a combination of solutions that seems to do the trick (at least for me)
